name: You Only Live 9 Times
description:
CLASSIFIED

In Charge: ▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

Subject: Cats

Date: 08/28/2020

Details: On 27 August 2020, Mr. ▓▓▓▓▓ discovered that cats can travel through  universes when they dead as a result of his experiments.

With he is in charge we started our experiments with a cat name Rime in ▓▓▓▓▓ lab of Brick Corp..

R.▓▓▓▓▓

Acting Director of ▓▓▓▓▓ Department

Other then the background music and used font, all assets made by myself in 5 days.

Special thanks to Kardelen for background music and Remoob Team for feedbacks. 

Team

Ali Ege Zabcı(2D Designer, Developer, Sound Designer, Game Designer, Professional Time Traveler and  Lightsaber Engineer)

Controls

WASD to move and Space Key to jump

R ---> Restart Level

N---> Skip Level

Used Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P?category=Display
